name: Craftbot FLOW IDEX XL (0.8 nozzle) (Right)
machine_start_gcode:
;Right only (i.e. T1)
M9006 S0;set DEFAULT mode 0=DEFAULT, 1=MIRROR, 2=PARALLEL, 3=not used, 4=INVERTHEAD, 5=BACKUP
;if you want to be able to set the mode on the HMI, you have to comment out the above line
M900 K0;turn off linear advance
M140 S{first_layer_bed_temperature[0]};set bed temp (no wait)
M104 S{first_layer_temperature[0]} T1;set extruder temp (no wait)
G28 X Y;home X and Y axes
G28 Z;home Z
;wait for all temperatures
M190 S{first_layer_bed_temperature[0]};set bed temp (wait)
M109 S{first_layer_temperature[0]} T1;set extruder temp (wait)
T1 ; switch to tool position T1
G21;mm
G90;absolute positioning
G92 E0;reset extruder
M425 S1 ;use wiper blade
M430 Z1 F1800 ; Set head change elevation 1mm
M431 E4 F1800  ;Head change exit retract 4mm
M433 E4 F1800;Head change enter prime 4mm
M300;signal start of print
;move head to the wipe position while extruding some filament. That way
;the nozzle is primed and when the print starts, the filament is wiped off.
G1 Y140 F1800 E13
machine_end_gcode:
G101 F3600 Z10;lower the bed 10mm
G90;absolute positioning
G28 X Y;home X and Y
G0 Y250;move Y back away from the camera
M104 T0 S0;turn off left extruder heater
M104 T1 S0;turn off right extruder heater
M140 S0;turn off bed heater
M106 T0 S0;turn off left fan
M106 T1 S0;turn off right fan
M84;disable motors
M900 K0;turn off linear advance
